name: Data Science Specialization Rakamin Academy
desc: Participated in an intensive data science training program covering business understanding, data analysis, data manipulation, machine learning, deep learning, and building end-to-end systems.
Collaborated with mentors and peers to create machine learning models predicting Airbnb room prices and build web applications for the final project.
Our team was nominated as one of the top 3 teams to present in the final presentation in front of the Chief Technology Officer of Rakamin and the Data Manager.

name: UI/UX Design Mentorship RISTEK University of Indonesia
desc: Selected as a mentee after a rigorous selection process involving 30 candidates.
The mentorship program focusing on user-centered design and prototyping.
Collaborated with peers and mentors to create wireframes and usability tests for an online educational platform, enhancing user engagement.
